solution_line_template: The farmer planted a total of {num_rows} x {plants_per_row} = <<{num_rows}*{plants_per_row}={total_plants}>>{total_plants} tomato plants.
Thus, the farmer can get {total_plants} x {yield_per_plant} = <<{total_plants}*{yield_per_plant}={total_tomatoes}>>{total_tomatoes} pieces of tomatoes.
